propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each slot inside the AvatarGroup.
propDescriptions.sx: Prop que permite sobrescrever estilos CSS adicionais. Veja a `sx` page para mais detalhes.
propDescriptions.total: The total number of avatars. Used for calculating the number of extra avatars.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
